title: Part 690 - Admission To Practice Of Attorneys And Counselors-at-law
content:

§ 690.3 - Admission without examination; pro hac vice
§ 690.4 - Volunteer program
§ 690.5 - Filing of application papers

§ 690.7 - Quorum for committee action

§ 690.10 - Procedure upon recommendation of disapproval, deferral or committee consideration
§ 690.11 - Notice of hearing; waiver
§ 690.12 - Procedure at hearing
§ 690.13 - Stenographic record or tape recording
§ 690.14 - Decision or report following hearing
§ 690.15 - Transmittal of decision to Appellate Division following hearing conducted by committee
§ 690.16 - Review by committee following hearing conducted by subcommittee
§ 690.17 - Appellate Division review of committee's recommendation
§ 690.18 - Petition to Appellate Division in case of unreasonable delay
§ 690.19 - Petition for advance ruling with respect to past conduct

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
